_meta.coauthor: Claude 4.6 Opus, Claude Code (coding assistant), Cursor (IDE)
_meta.description: Composition presets for creative prompt engineering

presets.name: Rule of Thirds
presets.promptFragment: rule of thirds composition, subject placed at intersection points, balanced asymmetrical framing
presets.description: The foundational composition rule — subject placed at the intersection of imaginary grid lines dividing the frame into thirds
presets.usage: Use for nearly any subject to create dynamic, balanced compositions that feel natural and engaging

presets.name: Centered / Symmetrical
presets.promptFragment: centered symmetrical composition, subject perfectly centered, balanced mirror symmetry, powerful focal point
presets.description: Subject placed dead center with mirror-like symmetry, creating a sense of order, power, and deliberate formality
presets.usage: Use for portraits, architecture, and subjects that convey authority, formality, or meditative stillness

presets.name: Leading Lines
presets.promptFragment: leading lines composition, converging lines drawing the eye to the subject, strong directional perspective
presets.description: Natural or architectural lines in the scene converge to guide the viewer's eye directly to the main subject
presets.usage: Use when the environment has strong linear elements (roads, rails, architecture) that can direct attention to the subject

presets.name: Frame Within Frame
presets.promptFragment: frame within a frame composition, subject framed by environmental elements, natural border, layered depth
presets.description: Using doorways, windows, arches, or foliage as a natural frame around the subject, adding depth and context
presets.usage: Use to add depth and draw attention to the subject by surrounding it with environmental framing elements

presets.name: Negative Space
presets.promptFragment: negative space composition, vast empty area surrounding small subject, minimalist framing, isolation emphasis
presets.description: Surrounding the subject with vast empty space to emphasize isolation, scale, or contemplative minimalism
presets.usage: Use when you want to convey loneliness, vastness, simplicity, or to give the subject room to breathe

presets.name: Bird's Eye View
presets.promptFragment: bird's eye view, top-down overhead perspective, looking straight down, flat pattern-like composition
presets.description: Looking directly downward from above, transforming the scene into a flat, pattern-like composition
presets.usage: Use to reveal patterns, spatial relationships, and abstract qualities not visible from ground level

presets.name: Worm's Eye View
presets.promptFragment: worm's eye view, extreme low angle looking upward, towering perspective, dramatic sense of scale
presets.description: Looking upward from ground level, making subjects appear towering, powerful, and monumentally imposing
presets.usage: Use to make subjects appear powerful, imposing, or heroic — great for architecture and dramatic portraits

presets.name: Dutch Angle
presets.promptFragment: Dutch angle, tilted camera angle, diagonal horizon line, dynamic tension, disorienting perspective
presets.description: Camera tilted on its axis creating a diagonal horizon, injecting tension, unease, and dynamic energy
presets.usage: Use to convey psychological tension, action, disorientation, or to add visual energy to static scenes

presets.name: Over the Shoulder
presets.promptFragment: over the shoulder composition, foreground shoulder framing, looking past one subject toward another, intimate perspective
presets.description: Camera positioned behind one subject's shoulder looking toward the main point of interest, establishing relationship and perspective
presets.usage: Use for conversations, revealing what a character sees, or establishing spatial relationships between subjects

presets.name: Close-Up Detail
presets.promptFragment: extreme close-up detail shot, tightly cropped, filling the frame with texture and detail, macro-level intimacy
presets.description: Tight framing that fills the entire image with a single detail, revealing texture and nuance invisible at normal distance
presets.usage: Use to highlight texture, emotion (facial close-ups), or intricate details that tell a story at micro scale

presets.name: Wide Establishing Shot
presets.promptFragment: wide establishing shot, expansive scene-setting composition, full environment visible, subject in context of surroundings
presets.description: A broad, scene-setting composition that shows the full environment and establishes the subject within its world
presets.usage: Use to open a scene, establish location and context, or convey the full scope and scale of an environment

presets.name: Shallow Depth of Field
presets.promptFragment: shallow depth of field, sharp subject with beautifully blurred background, strong bokeh, subject isolation
presets.description: Razor-thin focus plane keeps only the subject sharp while the background dissolves into creamy bokeh blur
presets.usage: Use to isolate the subject from a busy or distracting background, creating a professional, cinematic look
